tag.description: The namespace and ID of the tag which the damage type should be in to pass the check.
tag.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the tag which the damage type should be in to pass the check.

type.description:
## In Tag

---


[Damage Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/damage_condition_types/in_tag)

Checks whether the type of this damage is in a specified tag.

Type ID: `origins:in_tag`




---

### üìù Note

See [Minecraft Wiki: Tag (Damage types)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/damage_condition_types/in_tag) for a list of of damage type tags provided/used in vanilla.



---

### Examples

```json
"damage_condition": {
    "type": "origins:in_tag",
    "tag": "minecraft:is_drowning"
}
```

This example will check if the damage is considered drowning damage.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: In Tag (Damage Condition Type) date: 2023-05-21

In Tag

Damage Condition Type

Checks whether the type of this damage is in a specified tag.

Type ID: origins:in_tag

!!! note

See [Minecraft Wiki: Tag (Damage types)](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Tag#Damage_types) for a list of of damage type tags provided/used in vanilla.

Fields

Field Type Default Description
tag Identifier The namespace and ID of the tag which the damage type should be in to pass the check.

Examples

"damage_condition": {
    "type": "origins:in_tag",
    "tag": "minecraft:is_drowning"
}

This example will check if the damage is considered drowning damage.
